problem: 问题3 已知 $a, b, x, y \in \mathbf{R}^{+}$, 且 $\frac{a}{x}+\frac{b}{y}=1$, 求 $x+y$ 的最小值.
solution: 令 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}\frac{a}{x}=\sin ^2 \alpha, \\ \frac{b}{y}=\cos ^2 \alpha,\end{array} \alpha \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right)\right.$, 则 $x+y=\frac{a}{\sin ^2 \alpha}+\frac{b}{\cos ^2 \alpha}=a \csc ^2 \alpha+ b \sec ^2 \alpha=a+b+a \cot ^2 \alpha+b \tan ^2 \alpha \geqslant a+b+2 \sqrt{a b}$, 所以, $(x+y)_{\min }=a+b+ 2 \sqrt{a b}$.
